alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 11 at 2:51AM MST until March 11 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Central and Southeast Phillips, Central and Southern Valley and Western Roosevelt Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could generate drifts on area roads.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Central and Southern Valley; Western Roosevelt
